transcript: there's just lines and boundaries as soon as you draw them it changes the dynamic of a friendship and someone's like hey man I'm I'm moving out like will you help me move out I'd be like no I won't but I'll give you $200 if you need money to pay someone to like fulfill my friend Duty I want to make sure that we're cool and if that person gets all upset about that then like they're probably not going to be friends with me for very long anyways quickly someone will start to adjust and be like I'm not sure if I should ask Alex cuz he's probably just going to say no and offer me money
